response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, as it represents years of dedication and innovation. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000, a significant discount compared to its market value. We believe this is an opportunity for you to acquire a piece that not only adds value to your collection but also stands as a testament to your discerning taste. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange for a viewing.", "product_price": 950000}
